name: @bmi/gcp-cron-rm-unverified-users
description: BMI InTouch Function remove auth0 user

scripts.deploy: yarn build && gcloud functions deploy pubsub-cron-rm-unverified-users --runtime=nodejs14 --entry-point=removeAuth0UnverifiedAccount --source=.  --region=europe-west2 --trigger-topic=cron-rm-unverified-users
